Index: frameworks/base/packages/BackupRestoreConfirmation/res/values-fr-rFR/strings.xml
===================================================================
--- frameworks/base/packages/BackupRestoreConfirmation/res/values-fr-rFR/strings.xml	(revision 0)
+++ frameworks/base/packages/BackupRestoreConfirmation/res/values-fr-rFR/strings.xml	(revision 4832)
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- Title of the activity when a full backup has been requested and must be confirmed -->
+    <string name="backup_confirm_title">Sauvegarde complète</string>
+    <!-- Title of the activity when a full restore has been requested and must be confirmed -->
+    <string name="restore_confirm_title">Restauration complète</string>
+
+    <!-- Text for message to user that a full backup has been requested, and must be confirmed. -->
+    <string name="backup_confirm_text">Une sauvegarde complète de toutes les données sur un ordinateur connecté a été demandée. Voulez\u2011vous autoriser l’opération \?\n\nSi vous n’avez pas demandé vous\u2011même cette sauvegarde, n’autorisez pas l’opération.</string>
+    <!-- Button to allow a requested full backup to occur -->
+    <string name="allow_backup_button_label">Sauver mes données</string>
+    <!-- Button to refuse to allow the requested full backup -->
+    <string name="deny_backup_button_label">Ne pas sauvegarder</string>
+
+    <!-- Text for message to user that a full restore has been requested, and must be confirmed. -->
+    <string name="restore_confirm_text">Une restauration de l’intégralité des données a été demandée depuis un ordinateur connecté. Voulez\u2011vous autoriser l’opération \?\n\nSi vous n’avez pas formulé la demande de restauration vous\u2011même, n’autorisez pas l’opération. Celle\u2011ci remplace toutes les données se trouvant dans l’appareil.</string>
+    <!-- Button to allow a requested full restore to occur -->
+    <string name="allow_restore_button_label">Récupérer les données</string>
+    <!-- Button to refuse to allow the requested full restore -->
+    <string name="deny_restore_button_label">Ne pas restaurer</string>
+
+    <!-- Text for message to user that they must enter their predefined backup password in order to perform this operation. -->
+    <string name="current_password_text">Saisissez le mot de passe de sauvegarde ci\u2011dessous :</string>
+    <!-- Text for message to user that they must enter their device encryption password in order to perform this restore operation. -->
+    <string name="device_encryption_restore_text">Saisissez le mot de passe de chiffrement de votre appareil ci\u2011dessous.</string>
+    <!-- Text for message to user that they must enter their device encryption password in order to perform this backup operation. -->
+    <string name="device_encryption_backup_text">Saisissez le mot de passe de chiffrement de votre appareil ci\u2011dessous. Celui\u2011ci servira également à chiffrer l’archive de sauvegarde.</string>
+
+    <!-- Text for message to user that they must enter an encryption password to use for the full backup operation. -->
+    <string name="backup_enc_password_text">Saisissez un mot de passe à utiliser pour le chiffrement de toutes les données de la sauvegarde. Si vous laissez ce champ vide, votre mot de passe de sauvegarde sera utilisé :</string>
+    <!-- Text for message to user that they may optionally supply an encryption password to use for a full backup operation. -->
+    <string name="backup_enc_password_optional">Pour chiffrer les données de la sauvegarde, tapez un mot de passe ci\u2011dessous :</string>
+    <!-- Text for message to user that they must supply an encryption password to use for a full backup operation because their phone is locked. -->
+    <string name="backup_enc_password_required">Votre appareil est chiffré. Vous devez dès lors chiffrer aussi votre sauvegarde. Tapez un mot de passe ci\u2011dessous :</string>
+
+    <!-- Text for message to user when performing a full restore operation, explaining that they must enter the password originally used to encrypt the full backup data. -->
+    <string name="restore_enc_password_text">Si les données de restauration sont chiffrées, saisissez le mot de passe ci\u2011dessous :</string>
+
+    <!-- Text of a toast telling the user that a full backup operation has begun -->
+    <string name="toast_backup_started">Lancement de la sauvegarde…</string>
+    <!-- Text of a toast telling the user that a full backup operation has ended -->
+    <string name="toast_backup_ended">Sauvegarde terminée</string>
+    <!-- Text of a toast telling the user that a full restore operation has begun -->
+    <string name="toast_restore_started">Lancement de la restauration…</string>
+    <!-- Text of a toast telling the user that a full restore operation has ended -->
+    <string name="toast_restore_ended">Restauration terminée</string>
+    <!-- Text of a toast telling the user that the operation has timed out -->
+    <string name="toast_timeout">L’opération a expiré.</string>
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file

+    <!-- These should be overriden in an overlay. The default implementation is empty.
+         There needs to be correspondence per index between these arrays, which means that if there
+         isn't a longpress action associated with a shortcut item, put in an empty item to make
+         sure everything lines up.
+    -->
+    <array name="car_facet_icons"/>
+    <array name="car_facet_intent_uris"/>
+    <array name="car_facet_longpress_intent_uris"/>
+    <array name="car_facet_package_filters"/>
+    <array name="car_facet_category_filters"/>
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <string name="car_lockscreen_disclaimer_title">Conduzca con seguridad</string>
+    <string name="car_lockscreen_disclaimer_text">Preste mucha atención a las condiciones de la conducción y obedezca siempre las leyes aplicables. Las indicaciones pueden ser imprecisas, incompletas, no adecuadas o implicar el cruce de zonas administrativas. Es posible que la información empresarial tampoco sea precisa ni completa. Los datos no son en tiempo real y no se puede garantizar la precisión de las ubicaciones. No manipule el dispositivo móvil ni utilice aplicaciones que no sean para Android Auto mientras conduzca.</string>

+         sure everything lines up.

+++ frameworks/base/packages/WallpaperCropper/res/values-fr-rFR/strings.xml	(revision 4832)
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <string name="crop_wallpaper">Rogner le fond d’écran</string>
+    <!-- Button label on Wallpaper picker screen; user selects this button to set a specific wallpaper -->
+    <string name="wallpaper_instructions">Choisir</string>
+    <!-- Error message when an image is selected as a wallpaper,
+         but the wallpaper cropper cannot load it. The user will
+         usually see this when using another app and trying to set
+         an image as the wallpaper -->
+    <string name="wallpaper_load_fail">Impossible de charger l’image comme fond d’écran</string>
+</resources>

+    <!-- Button label on Wallpaper picker screen; user selects this button to set a specific wallpaper -->
+    <string name="wallpaper_instructions">definir papel de parede</string>

+         but the wallpaper cropper cannot load it. The user will
+         usually see this when using another app and trying to set
+         an image as the wallpaper -->

+</resources>

+    <!-- Wi-Fi settings. The status messages when the network is known. -->

+        <item/>

+        <item>Scanning\u2026</item>
+        <!-- Status message of Wi-Fi when it is connecting to a network. -->
+        <item>Connecting to <xliff:g id="network_name">%1$s</xliff:g>\u2026</item>
+        <!-- Status message of Wi-Fi when it is authenticating with a network. -->
+        <item>Authenticating with <xliff:g id="network_name">%1$s</xliff:g>\u2026</item>
+        <!-- Status message of Wi-Fi when it is obtaining IP address from a network. -->
+        <item>Obtaining IP address from <xliff:g id="network_name">%1$s</xliff:g>\u2026</item>
+        <!-- Status message of Wi-Fi when it is connected to a network. -->
+        <item>Connected to <xliff:g id="network_name">%1$s</xliff:g></item>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+
+    <string name="wifi_security_wapi_psk" translatable="false">WAPI PSK</string>
+    <string name="wifi_security_wapi_certificate">WAPI Certificate</string>
+    <!-- Bluetooth settings. The user-visible string that is used whenever referring to the DUN profile. [CHAR LIMIT=40] -->
+    <string name="bluetooth_profile_dun" translatable="false">Dial up network</string>
+    <!-- Bluetooth settings. The user-visible summary string that is used whenever referring to the DUN profile (sharing contacts). [CHAR LIMIT=60] -->
+    <string name="bluetooth_profile_dun_summary" translatable="false">Use for dial up network</string>

+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <string name="app_label">Shell</string>
+
+    <!-- Title of notification indicating a bugreport is being generated. [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_in_progress_title">Bug report <xliff:g id="id">#%d</xliff:g> is being generated</string>
+    <!-- Title of notification indicating a bugreport has been successfully captured. [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_finished_title">Bug report <xliff:g id="id">#%d</xliff:g> captured</string>
+    <!-- Title of notification indicating a bugreport is being updated before it can be shared. [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_updating_title">Adding details to the bug report</string>
+    <!-- Content notification indicating a bugreport is being updated before it can be shared, asking the user to wait [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_updating_wait">Please wait\u2026</string>
+
+    <!-- Text of notification indicating that bugreport will appear on the phone. [CHAR LIMIT=100] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_finished_text" product="watch">The bug report will appear on the phone shortly</string>
+    <!-- Text of notification indicating that tapping will share the captured bugreport. [CHAR LIMIT=100] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_finished_text" product="default">Touch to share your bug report</string>
+    <!-- Text of notification indicating that swipe left will share the captured bugreport, but giving user the option to wait for the screenshot. [CHAR LIMIT=100] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_finished_pending_screenshot_text" product="watch">Touch to share your bug report without a screenshot or wait for the screenshot to finish</string>
+    <!-- Text of notification indicating that tapping will share the captured bugreport, but giving user the option to wait for the screenshot. [CHAR LIMIT=100] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_finished_pending_screenshot_text" product="default">Touch to share your bug report without a screenshot or wait for the screenshot to finish</string>
+
+    <!-- Body of dialog informing user about contents of a bugreport. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_confirm">Bug reports contain data from the system\\u2019s various log files, which may include data you consider sensitive (such as app\u2011usage and location data). Only share bug reports with people and apps you trust.</string>
+    <!-- Checkbox that indicates this dialog should not be shown again when the next bugreport is taken. [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="bugreport_confirm_dont_repeat">Don\u2019t show again</string>
+
+    <!-- Title for documents backend that offers bugreports. -->
+    <string name="bugreport_storage_title">Bug reports</string>
+
+    <!-- Toast message sent when the bugreport file could be read. -->
+    <string name="bugreport_unreadable_text">Bug report file could not be read</string>
+    <!-- Toast message sent when the bugreport details could not be added to the zip file. -->
+    <string name="bugreport_add_details_to_zip_failed">Couldn\\u2019t add bug report details to zip file</string>
+
+    <!-- Title for bug reports received from dumpstate without a name. [CHAR LIMIT=30]-->
+    <string name="bugreport_unnamed">unnamed</string>
+
+    <!-- Title of the notification action that opens the dialog for the user-defined bug report details. -->
+    <string name="bugreport_info_action">Details</string>
+
+    <!-- Title of the notification action that takes aditional screenshots. -->
+    <string name="bugreport_screenshot_action">Screenshot</string>
+
+    <!-- Toast message sent when the a screenshot for the bug report was taken successfully. -->
+    <string name="bugreport_screenshot_taken">Screenshot taken</string>
+    <!-- Toast message sent when the a screenshot for the bug report was not taken due to an error. -->
+    <string name="bugreport_screenshot_failed">Couldn\u2019t take screenshot</string>

+    <string name="save">Guardar</string>

@@ -0,0 +1,359 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- App label in the manifest  -->
+    <string name="app_name">Trousseau</string>
+    <!-- Instructions telling the user to enter their SIM PIN to unlock the keyguard.
+         Displayed in one line in a large font.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_enter_pin_code">Saisissez le code PIN.</string>
+
+    <!-- Instructions telling the user to enter their SIM PUK to unlock the keyguard.
+         Displayed in one line in a large font.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_enter_puk_code">Saisir le code PUK et le nouveau code PIN de la carte SIM</string>
+
+    <!-- Prompt to enter SIM PUK in Edit Text Box in unlock screen -->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_enter_puk_prompt">Clé PUK de la carte SIM</string>
+    <!-- Prompt to enter New SIM PIN in Edit Text Box in unlock screen -->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_enter_pin_prompt">Nouveau code PIN de la carte SIM</string>
+
+    <!-- Displayed as hint in passwordEntry EditText on PasswordUnlockScreen [CHAR LIMIT=30]-->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_entry_touch_hint"><font size="17">Touch to type password</font></string>
+
+    <!-- Instructions telling the user to enter their text password to unlock the keyguard.
+         Displayed in one line in a large font.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_enter_password_code">Saisir mot de passe pour déverrouiller le clavier</string>
+
+    <!-- Instructions telling the user to enter their PIN password to unlock the keyguard.
+         Displayed in one line in a large font.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_enter_pin_password_code">Saisir le code PIN pour déverrouiller le clavier.</string>
+
+    <!-- Instructions telling the user that they entered the wrong pin while trying
+         to unlock the keyguard.  Displayed in one line in a large font.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_password_wrong_pin_code">Le code PIN est erroné.</string>
+
+    <!-- When the lock screen is showing, the phone is plugged in and the battery is fully
+         charged, say that it is charged. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_charged">Chargé</string>
+
+    <!-- When the lock screen is showing and the phone plugged in, and the battery
+         is not fully charged, say that it's charging.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_plugged_in">Batterie en charge</string>
+
+    <!-- When the lock screen is showing and the phone plugged in, and the battery
+         is not fully charged, and it's plugged into a fast charger, say that it's charging fast.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_plugged_in_charging_fast">Recharge rapide</string>
+
+    <!-- When the lock screen is showing and the phone plugged in, and the battery
+         is not fully charged, and it's plugged into a slow charger, say that it's charging slowly.  -->
+    <string name="keyguard_plugged_in_charging_slowly">Recharge lente</string>
+
+    <!-- When the lock screen is showing and the battery is low, warn user to plug
+         in the phone soon. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_low_battery">Branchez votre chargeur.</string>
+
+    <!-- On the keyguard screen, when pattern lock is disabled, only tell them to press menu to unlock.  This is shown in small font at the bottom. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_instructions_when_pattern_disabled">Appuyez sur Menu pour déverrouiller.</string>
+
+    <!-- SIM messages --><skip/>
+    <!-- When the user inserts a sim card from an unsupported network, it becomes network locked -->
+    <string name="keyguard_network_locked_message">Réseau verrouillé</string>
+    <!-- Shown when there is no SIM card. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_missing_sim_message_short">Aucune carte SIM</string>
+    <!-- Shown when there is no SIM card. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_missing_sim_message" product="tablet">No SIM card in tablet.</string>
+    <!-- Shown when there is no SIM card. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_missing_sim_message" product="default">Aucune carte SIM n\u2019est insérée dans le téléphone.</string>
+    <!-- Shown to ask the user to insert a SIM card. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_missing_sim_instructions">Insérez une carte SIM.</string>
+    <!-- Shown to ask the user to insert a SIM card when sim is missing or not readable. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_missing_sim_instructions_long">Carte SIM absente ou illisible. Veuillez insérer une carte SIM.</string>
+    <!-- Shown when SIM card is permanently disabled. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_permanent_disabled_sim_message_short">Carte SIM inutilisable</string>
+    <!-- Shown to inform the user to SIM card is permanently disabled. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_permanent_disabled_sim_instructions">Votre carte SIM a été désactivée.\n Veuillez contacter votre opérateur de téléphonie mobile pour en obtenir une autre.</string>
+    <!-- Shown to tell the user that their SIM is locked and they must unlock it. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_sim_locked_message">La carte SIM est verrouillée.</string>
+    <!-- When the user enters a wrong sim pin too many times, it becomes PUK locked (Pin Unlock Kode) -->
+    <string name="keyguard_sim_puk_locked_message">SIM verrouillée</string>
+    <!-- For the unlock screen, When the user enters a sim unlock code, it takes a little while to check
+         whether it is valid, and to unlock the sim if it is valid.  we display a
+         progress dialog in the meantime.  this is the emssage. -->
+    <string name="keyguard_sim_unlock_progress_dialog_message">Déblocage de la carte SIM...</string>
+
+    <!-- Time format strings for fall-back clock widget -->
+    <string name="keyguard_widget_12_hours_format" translatable="false">h\uee01mm</string>
+    <!-- Time format strings for fall-back clock widget -->
+    <string name="keyguard_widget_24_hours_format" translatable="false">kk\uee01mm</string>
+
+    <!-- Accessibility description of the PIN password view. [CHAR_LIMIT=none] -->
+    <string name="keyguard_accessibility_pin_area">Zone PIN</string>
+    <!-- Accessibility description of the SIM PIN password view. [CHAR_LIMIT=none] -->
+    <string name="keyguard_accessibility_sim_pin_area">Zone PIN de la carte SIM</string>
+    <!-- Accessibility description of the SIM PUK password view. [CHAR_LIMIT=none] -->
+    <string name="keyguard_accessibility_sim_puk_area">Zone PUK de la carte SIM</string>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+
+    <!-- list of 3- or 4-letter mnemonics for a 10-key numeric keypad -->
+    <string-array name="lockscreen_num_pad_klondike" translatable="false">
+        <item>+</item><!-- 0 -->
+        <item/><!-- 1 -->
+        <item>ABC</item><!-- 2 -->
+        <item>DEF</item><!-- 3 -->
+        <item>GHI</item><!-- 4 -->
+        <item>JKL</item><!-- 5 -->
+        <item>MNO</item><!-- 6 -->
+        <item>PQRS</item><!-- 7 -->
+        <item>TUV</item><!-- 8 -->
+        <item>WXYZ</item><!-- 9 -->
+    </string-array>
+</resources>
